mapper.select: SELECT f.member_idx, f.funding_idx, f.funding_title, f.funding_thumbnail, f.funding_target_price, f.funding_current_price, f.funding_start_date, f.funding_end_date, f.funding_content, f.funding_permit_state, f.funding_current_state, f.funding_category, f.funding_views, f.funding_express_date, f.funding_express_fee FROM funding f, message m WHERE f.funding_idx = m.funding_idx AND m.to_member_idx = #{ member_idx } ORDER BY m.message_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message_notice (from_member_idx, to_member_idx, funding_idx, f_or_s, message_content) VALUES ( #{ from_member_idx }, #{ to_member_idx }, #{ funding_idx }, #{ f_or_s }, #{ message_content } )
mapper.select: select f.funding_title, f.funding_thumbnail, mn.message_notice_idx, mn.from_member_idx, mn.to_member_idx, mn.funding_idx, mn.store_idx, mn.f_or_s, message_content, message_notice_date from message_notice mn, funding f, store s where mn.to_member_idx=#{to_member_idx} and mn.funding_idx=f.funding_idx

select msd.from_member_idx from(select * from message m where m.to_member_idx=#{to_member_idx} and m.message_state=1 order by m.message_date desc LIMIT 18446744073709551615) msd GROUP by msd.from_member_idx

select m.member_idx, m.member_name, m.member_photo, ms.message_idx, ms.from_member_idx, ms.to_member_idx, ms.funding_idx, ms.message_content, ms.message_photo, ms.message_state, ms.message_send_person, ms.message_date FROM message ms, member m WHERE ms.from_member_idx = m.member_idx AND ms.to_member_idx=#{to_member_idx} AND ms.from_member_idx=#{from_member_idx} ORDER BY ms.message_date desc limit 1

SELECT msd.* FROM (SELECT ms.funding_idx, ms.store_idx, m.member_idx, m.member_name, m.member_photo, mn.message_note_idx, mn.message_idx, mn.from_member_idx, mn.to_member_idx, mn.message_content, mn.message_photo, mn.c_or_p, mn.message_note_date FROM message_note mn, member m, message ms where m.member_idx = mn.from_member_idx and ms.message_idx = mn.message_idx and mn.to_member_idx = #{member_idx} order by mn.message_note_date desc LIMIT 18446744073709551615) msd GROUP BY msd.from_member_idx

SELECT ms.funding_idx, m.member_idx, m.member_name, m.member_photo, mn.message_note_idx, mn.message_idx, mn.from_member_idx, mn.to_member_idx, mn.message_content, mn.message_photo, mn.c_or_p, mn.message_note_date FROM message_note mn, member m, message ms WHERE m.member_idx = mn.from_member_idx AND mn.message_idx = ms.message_idx AND ms.message_idx = mn.message_idx AND mn.to_member_idx = #{to_member_idx} AND ms.funding_idx = #{funding_idx} ORDER BY mn.message_note_date

select mn.message_note_idx, mn.message_idx, mn.from_member_idx, mn.to_member_idx, mn.message_content, mn.message_photo, mn.c_or_p, mn.message_note_date from message_note mn where mn.message_idx=#{message_idx}

insert.if: insert into message_note(message_idx, from_member_idx, to_member_idx, message_content, c_or_p) values(#{message_idx}, #{from_member_idx}, #{to_member_idx}, #{message_content}, 'c')
insert into message_note(message_idx, from_member_idx, to_member_idx, message_content, c_or_p) values(#{message_idx}, #{from_member_idx}, #{to_member_idx}, #{message_photo}, 'p')
insert into message(message_idx, funding_idx, f_or_s, message_category) values(default, #{funding_idx}, 'f', 0)
insert into message(message_idx, store_idx, f_or_s, message_category) values(default, #{store_idx}, 's', 0)

mapper.select: SELECT message_idx FROM message ORDER BY message_date DESC LIMIT 1
